txt.en: Herein are contained the laws, proceedings, and customs that govern official Shire festivals, banquets, holidays, and gatherings of no less than twenty persons.

Section IV, Subsection XXI-IIIb\nMany of the large Shire-holidays, fairs, and communal festivities are coordinated by an appointed Farthing-planner in accordance with the Shire Book of Festival-law.  Some fests and banquets however are organized by the township and not by the Farthing-planners.  Yule is such a feast, intended to bring together the community.
